message.body: Lee are you back in Portland?

yeah.. i'm at marina's, but i've been sick most of the week, characteristically. i'm starting to feel better,though, which is good, because portland requires strength, i think. the folks left me to go to bellingham today, which makes for a strange last day in seattle. i've been pawing through craigslist, but i think i'm going to take a break, make some food, and read a book about flowers for a while.
